files.README.md:
# Claude Code plugins by Andrey Tarantsov

Install:

```
/plugin marketplace add andreyvit/claude-code-plugins
```

Includes:

* [rockstar](https://github.com/andreyvit/rockstar) (`/plugin install rockstar`) â€” AI skills to rock your development
